definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: ford, pass, passage;—abs. ´[[מ]] Is 10:29; pl. [[מַעְבָּרוֹת]] Is 16:2, Je 51:32, [[מַעְבְּרוֹת]] abs. Jos 2:7, 1Sa 14:4; cstr. Ju Jdg 3:28 + 2 t.;—
ford, only pl. Jos 2:7 (JE), Ju Jdg 3:28, Jdg 12:5, Jdg 12:6, Is 16:2; so also 1Sa 13:7 (for MT [[עָֽבְרוּ]]) We Dr Kit Löhr; + [[מַעְבֶּרֶת]] 1Ki 7:46 = 2Ch 4:17, v. [[סֻכּוֹת]]
passage in defensive works of Bab. Je 51:32.
